attributes.action: Hold a General Election in August 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of this country have had enough of this Government and demand that the Prime Minister calls a General Election to be held in August 2008.  We do not want to wait until he decides when the election is called. We, the people want a General election NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
